text:
In the documentation it states 
"contextShutdown(Context ctx) 
          Called when a context is stoped, before removeContext"

However in the code it appears that shutdownContext occurs after 
removeContext...
This appears in versions 3.2.1, 3.2.2, 3.2.3, 3.3 documentation
I have only checked the code in 3.2.3

Personally I believe the documentation should be changed as logically the 
shutdown event should indicate that all references to the context have been 
removed.

Thanks

The doc in 3.3 has been fixed. The context can be shutdown ( doesn't accept 
requests ) but not removed ( it should return "application not available", 
which is different from 404 not found ).
